name: Razer Imperator Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [Ergonomic right-handed design, Adjustable side buttons, 5600dpi Razer Precision 3.5G Laser sensor, Razer Synapse On-board Memory, Up to 200 inches per second/ 50g acceleration, Seven independently programmable Hyperesponse buttons, 1000Hz Ultrapolling / 1ms response rate, On-The-Fly Sensitivity adjustment, Zero-acoustic Ultraslick Teflon feet]
